main.greeting: Where do you want to go?
main.searchbox: Search for flights, hotels, trains, and more

destination.title: Preferred Destination
destination.desc: Preferred destination for your joyful trip with {link}.

tour.title: Preferred Tours
tour.desc: Tour with {link} to various destinations in both local and international.

offline.title: You need an internet connection to use this app.
offline.desc: Please check your internet connection and try again by clicking the "Reload" button below.

title.login: Log In to enjoy every benefits and services in {link}
title.register: Register to enjoy every benefits and services in {link}

info.name: Fill in your name as it appears on your ID card.
info.no_company: You must registered as a company account to access the resource.

flight.unchangeable: The flight reservation can not be changed after you click the "Reserve" button.

email_and_phone_desc: Your email and phone number that will be used to log in and contact you.

email.nochange: You can't change your email address because you logged in with your {provider} account.

reset_password_desc: Reset password for your account to improve your account's security.
reset_password_info: For security reasons, you cannot change the password directly. Please log out and go to the Forgot Password page to change it.
forgot_password_desc: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.

auth.verify_email_desc: Thank you for registering! Before starting, please verify your email by clicking the link that we have sent to your email. If you don't receive an email, click the button below to resend the verification link.
auth.verification_email_sent: A fresh verification link has been sent to your email address.
auth.verified: Your email address has been verified.

profile.updated: Your profile information has been updated.

flight.seat_not_enough: Sorry, the number of seats available is not enough.

reservation.stored: Reservation has been stored. Please add payment to complete the reservation within {minute} minutes or the reservation will be expired.
reservation.expired: Reservation has been expired. Please make a new reservation.
